name: MyThemeShop Theme Customizer
author: MYThemeShop

sections.description:
Use this plugin to enable drag and drop homepage sections in OnePage Lite theme.

Live Demos

See MyThemeShop Theme Customizer Plugin in action on our demo:
* OnePage Lite Demo

MyThemeShop Theme Customizer offers below homepage sections:

  • Featured Section
  • Buttons Section
  • Clients Section
  • Counter Section
  • Features Section
  • Testimonials Section
  • Services Section
  • Team Section
  • Tweets Section

Note: Currently this plugin works only with OnePage Lite theme.

Support

All support for this plugin is provided through our forums. If you have not registered yet, you can do so here for FREE
https://mythemeshop.com/#signup

If after checking our Free WordPress video tutorials here:
https://mythemeshop.com/wordpress-101/
&
https://community.mythemeshop.com/tutorials/category/2-free-video-tutorials/

you are still stuck, please feel free to open a new thread, and a member of our support team will be happy to help.

Support link:
https://community.mythemeshop.com/forum/11-free-plugin-support/
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the mythemeshop-theme-customizer folder to the to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. You can see new widgets available in the ‘Widgets’ page in the dashboard.
  4. Add these widgets in homepage widget area in any order.
sections.faq:
Where is the settings page for this plugin?

This plugin don’t have any settings page, you can configure all the sections and settings from ‘Widgets’ page.
